description: Mentioned only by Irwin in a list of mixture stops under the heading �Color Due to Stop-Pitches�, with no definition. Not to be confused with the percussion stop Xylophone. Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Appendix D. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only. Xylophon.html - Last updated 4 May 2000.
